channel.title: Clickable Link, 508
channel.description:
Hey, i am currently re-vamping a rune-scape server source,
Mezzy-scape 508, and the one thing i have not got my head around yet is making a so called "click-able link" a click-able link is where you can click a Website in the Public chat and it redirects you to the Targeted Website. does anyone know how to do this?, help will be much appreciated, thanks Warouxriot :)
[u]Click on below to see a sample[/u] [url=http://img15.imageshack.us/i/likethisv.png/]http://img15.imageshack.us/i/likethisv.png/[/url]

Hey, i am currently re-vamping a rune-scape server source,
